TopicTitle: A `Flight statistics` screen when you recover flight like the one after a lithobrake.

Articles.Content:
I just landed a capsule after seeing a father high G-force on re-entry. I was curious how high it was so after landing I recovered my vehicle hoping to see the information display.

No show.

My suggestion is for every time a flight is ended to show (or have the option to show) the flight statistics screen (possibly with some checkboxes in the options for people to customise when they appear. Recovery, crash, revert etc)
You can press F3 to see the mission report at any time.

You can press F3 to see the mission report at any time.

Thank you very much. Did not know that. (I really should read the manual)
